# Machine Learning

> Standard library machine learning algorithms.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var ml = require( '@stdlib/math/ml' );
```

#### ml

Standard library machine learning algorithms.

``` javascript
var algs = ml;
// returns {...}
```

<!-- </usage> -->

``` javascript
var getKeys = require( 'object-keys' ).shim();
var ml = require( '@stdlib/math/ml' );

console.log( getKeys( ml ) );
```
